Drag components from the palette onto the canvas.
Hold CTRL or CMD and click elements to select multiple.
When multiple components are selected, use Arrange to align them.
Use Interface Management to define which interface types can connect.
Export your system as SVG or PNG for documentation.
Set trust levels on components for security analysis.
Use the Boundary Audit to review trust boundaries.
Connect compatible interfaces by dragging from one port to another.
Save your work with Ctrl+S or File → Save.
Load saved systems with File → Open.
